hero.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEER
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Web Developer
hero.tagline: Building futuristic web experiences with React, Next.js, and robust backends.

whoAmI.title: Who I Am
whoAmI.p1: I am a Full-Stack Developer passionate about creating high-performance, aesthetically pleasing, and scalable applications. My focus is on delivering clean code and exceptional user experience.
whoAmI.p2: I thrive in dynamic environments and am constantly seeking new technologies and challenges to grow my skills and deliver cutting-edge solutions.
whoAmI.p3: This is a placeholder for a third paragraph of your bio.

project_1_id.title: Project Alpha: AI Platform
project_1_id.description: A complex platform utilizing Next.js for SSR and integrating various AI services via a Node.js API gateway. Includes secure user authentication and payment processing.

project_2_id.title: Project Beta: E-commerce Site
project_2_id.description: A scalable e-commerce solution built with React and Redux, featuring real-time inventory updates and robust search functionality powered by MongoDB.

exp_1_id.title: Senior Frontend Developer
exp_1_id.description: Led the development of a major migration project from AngularJS to React, resulting in a 40% performance boost in load times.

exp_2_id.title: Full Stack Engineer
exp_2_id.description: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using Express.js and managed MongoDB databases for several key features.
